summary: This document is a letter from Jeffrey Epstein authorizing Harry Beller to have signing authority on an account associated with Plan D, LLC at Deutsche Bank. It indicates a financial arrangement and the management of accounts linked to Epstein.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as the recipient of the letter from Jeffrey Epstein regarding account authorization.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is granted signing authority on the account by Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the letter and the individual granting signing authority on the account.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein authorizes Harry Beller to have signing authority on his account, indicating a professional relationship.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY 10154
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein authorized Harry Beller to have signing authority on the account associated with Plan D, LLC.
The letter was addressed to Amanda Kirby at Deutsche Bank.
